Title: Material Library
Description:
Meet your new packaging command centre. Material Library brings all your packaging data into one place - no more scattered spreadsheets or annual data hunts.

Build a lasting data foundation that grows with your business, making it simple to track changes, manage compliance, and respond to new regulations. Finally, a single source of truth for your packaging that's always ready when you need it.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: View and Edit Packaging Data
Description:
**Sales**

SKU

Units Sold

**Product**

Product Name

Description

**Packaging**

Primary Packaging Components

Component Composition (material by weight)

Amount of Recycled Content

Recyclable?

Reusable?
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Description:
Browse

Search

Filters
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Correlation of sales, product, and packaging data in a single view
Description:
\-> **Sales** (SKU Code x Units Sold) 

\-> **Product** (SKU, Name, Description, Type, Tags, Meta Data) 

\-> **Packaging** (Type, BoM, Materials, etc.)

Refer to Entity Diagram
[https://www.notion.so/phantm/Entity-Diagram-for-discussion-135aa5c2d8e880f7b0abec9f34f774b0?pvs=4](https://www.notion.so/phantm/Entity-Diagram-for-discussion-135aa5c2d8e880f7b0abec9f34f774b0?pvs=4)

Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Multipart Data Import and Reconciliation
Description:
Case 1:

Import Sales Data Only 
**THEN** Import Product Data Only 
**REQUIRES** Data Reconciliation to join Product and Sales Data Together

Case 2: 

Import Sales Data Only **OR** Product Data Only
**THEN** Import Packaging Data
**REQUIRES** Data Reconciliation to join Packaging Data Together
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

e.g. Identifying an area for further investigation vs. APCO report vs. LCA

Title: Visual Indicators of data quality
Description: Make it clear when data is 'estimated' and to what degree it can be relied upon
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Back-test the results to fine tune
Description:
Run tests to measure accuracy of estimates against known data.
Create a mechanism to do this systematically on going (e.g. as we get real data, use it to check quality of previous estimations)
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Best Guess powered by AI
Description:
Jump-start your packaging insights and compliance reporting with AI-powered estimates. Best Guess analyses your existing product data to generate useful baseline packaging information in seconds - not months.

Even regulators understand perfect data isn't always possible. Start meeting compliance needs today with intelligent estimates that combine your available data with expert packaging knowledge to fill the gaps. Then improve accuracy over time as better information becomes available.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Expert moderation of Best Guess results
Description:
Solutions Team eyeball it, and normalise the results. 
Adjust prompts to 'train' the model.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Custom Data Schema Support
Description:
*Enterprise-ready data flexibility allowing customers to extend Captr's core data model with their own fields and tags, while maintaining platform integrity and scalability.*

### **General Direction**

*Balance customer flexibility with platform scalability through controlled customisation capabilities, leveraging our medallion architecture and flexible schema approach.*

* Schema extension mechanisms
* Custom field validation rules
* Field visibility controls
* Data migration tooling
* Performance monitoring
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Supplier Hub
Description:
Transform chaotic supplier communications into organised, accessible information. Our central hub helps your team collect and manage packaging specifications, supplier documents, and contact details - all in one place.

Stop losing vital data when people change roles. Simple tools for requests, reminders, and document management mean your whole team can collaborate effectively, building a lasting information asset over time.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Supplier Portal
Description: Enable suppliers to directly upload and manage packaging information via a web portal at retailer's request.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Supplier Performance Dashboard
Description:
Analysis and scoring of packaging materials associated with that supplier. 
High Level.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

e.g. Norwood -> Bunnings

Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Full Service Data Migration
Description:
Take the headache out of data migration. Our expert team handles the heavy lifting - working with your data in whatever format it exists, while our packaging specialists ensure everything is captured correctly.

From simple data uploads to complex enterprise migrations requiring on-site expertise, we scale our approach to fit your needs. Our unique blend of packaging knowledge, technical tools and hands-on support ensures a smooth transition to Captr.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: ERP Integrations
Description:
* Batch synchronisation engine
* Direct integration to selected ERP systems
* Handling data changes
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: API Development
Description:
* end-point for Inbound data (e.g. to support customers who collect data at Purchase Order)
* Two-way API, for selected scenarios
* Authentication/security
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Advanced Data Integration
Description:
Seamless data connections that fit your business. Whether you need automated data feeds from suppliers, integration with your existing systems, or custom connections to specialised tools - we'll find the right approach without disrupting your operations.

We grow our integration options based on customer needs, prioritising solutions that deliver the most value. Until then, our expert migration service ensures you're up and running quickly.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Data Migration Toolkit (Self Service)
Description: Simple self-service tools to help your team prepare and import packaging data. From basic templates to advanced import utilities, choose the tools that match your team's capabilities and preferences.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Progressive Data Enhancement
Description:
Turn overwhelming packaging data challenges into manageable steps. Our Progressive Data Enhancement approach spots patterns and makes targeted suggestions to help your team improve data quality steadily over time.

We'll guide you to the most impactful quick wins, using intelligent analysis to highlight gaps and validate information as you work. No magic wands - just practical support that makes continuous improvement achievable.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Email Automation and file upload by Supplier
Description:
*Frictionless specification capture through familiar business tools, making it easy for suppliers to provide packaging information through email or simple file uploads.*

* Unique supplier email addresses
* Emails and attachments stored in SRM Inbox
* Support Direct File Upload by Suppliers

Title: Data Intelligence Co-Pilot

Make smarter packaging decisions with AI-powered guidance at your fingertips. Co-Pilot continuously analyses your data, suggesting small, achievable improvements you can action today.

You're always in control - easily accept or dismiss recommendations that fit your priorities. No more overwhelming annual reviews; just steady progress towards your sustainability goals.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Phantm Portfolio Report
Description:
Transform weeks of expert analysis into instant insights. Get a professional-grade assessment of your packaging portfolio's impact the moment your data lands in Captr.

Paired with our Packaging Solutions Consulting, these automated reports help our experts deliver high-value recommendations faster, accelerating your journey to improved sustainability.
Creator: jonny@phantm.com

Title: Compliance Ready Reports

Meet compliance requirements with confidence. Our managed reports - starting with APCO submissions - turn months of manual work into automated reporting ready in minutes.

As new regulations emerge, we analyse requirements and create proven reporting solutions, ensuring you're always ahead of compliance needs.

Title: Thomas Foods - Custom Demo for Sales
Description:
As per discussion 3 December with Elliot, Paul, Lloyd, Andrew, Jonny. 

Thomas Foods have requested a demo. 
Bumped to week commencing 16 December. 

Their interests are:

1. See their data in Captr Demo (Tamworth Data provided)
2. Performance Insights
   1. Green House Gas Emissions
   2. Material breakdown by usage per facility
   3. Aggregated view of the above, across all facilities
   4. Multi Location Comparison e.g. Tamworth vs. Facility X
3. Specific questions/scenarios
   1. Retailer (e.g. Aldi) requests Thomas Foods to provide % of specific material, and/or GHG emissions related to Thomas Foods' supplied products

Elliot/Paul to request additional info:

* Product SKU Data
* Any other Specific Scenarios that we might look at
Creator: jonny@phantm.com
